Why don't we give Philip both the matching pair and give you each a pair of socks since he didn't get to  wear this one, they are brand new, in fact, and a big round of ______ for what I'm sure is a little difficult.
result.chn: 我们为什么不给飞利浦一双配对的袜子,给你们每人一双袜子,他还没穿这双袜子，所以这双还算是全新的，再次以热烈的掌声对他们表示感谢,这样的模仿还是有一些难度的。(计算机科学课程节选 : 哈佛公开课)

result.problem: The group advises chest thrusts instead of ______ thrusts.
"Of course,we don't know what doses they've received, but the only persons at risk of ______ radiation effects are the workers."
He even said the South had good reason to leave the Union, if northern Abolitionists continued their ______-slavery campaign.
It's because we have these performers up there that are reading this blueprint and everyone is listening, basically to see how accurately they can reproduce, revivify this artistic ______.
result.chn: 是因为台上有演奏人员,他们在看乐谱,大家都在听,基本上就是在揣摩,他们能在多大程度上精确地复制和再现,这件人工的艺术作品(聆听音乐课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: "These are the habitats that provide really valuable places for the fish to get together, to ______,to spawn, so they are the bases of the fisheries."
We start at this lower energy state and go up that means we need to ______ a photon, we have to take in energy.
result.chn: 我们从一个低能级开始，到一个高能级去,这意味着需要吸收一个光子，我们要获得能量。(化学原理课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: and hit balls as well from the back of elephants, ______ other things.
result.chn: 是从象背上去击球，除此之外都是一样的。(SpeakingMax英语口语达人 : 知道马球吗？)

result.problem: "I was accepted at Barnard College and I was denied ______ when I arrived because they had a quota of two.
They sit in rows just as they would in the ______ and they say, "Oh, when are we gonna be in Japan?"
result.chn: 他们像在飞机上一样坐成排,然后说：,“我们什么时候到日本？“(媒体、教育、市场课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: In eighteen ninety-seven, a chemist named Felix Hoffmann at Friedrich Bayer and Company in Germany created acetyl salicylic ______.
Over the centuries,scientific thinkers worked to develop these devices and improve their ______ and complexity.
"It goes beyond the facts in a biology textbook or the questions on an ______ quiz,"
You could go to Yeats's poem "Adam's Curse" to see the poet talking about this ______ ideal.
result.chn: 叶芝在他的诗歌亚当的诅咒里,谈论了他这一美学理想。(现代诗歌课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)
